member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.AnswerSpanRequest.Enable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether gets or sets the enablet.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.Dialogs.QnAMakerDialog
member.summary: A dialog that supports multi-step and adaptive-learning QnA Maker services.
member.remarks: An instance of this class targets a specific QnA Maker knowledge base. It supports knowledge bases that include follow-up prompt and active learning features.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.Dialogs.QnAMakerDialog.Kind
member.summary: The declarative name for this type.
member.remarks: Used by the framework to serialize and deserialize an instance of this type to JSON.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.Dialogs.QnAMakerDialog.QnAContextData
member.summary: The path for storing and retrieving QnA Maker context data.
member.remarks: This represents context about the current or previous call to QnA Maker. It is stored within the current step's . It supports QnA Maker's follow-up prompt and active learning features.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.Dialogs.QnAMakerDialog.PreviousQnAId
member.summary: The path for storing and retrieving the previous question ID.
member.remarks: This represents the QnA question ID from the previous turn. It is stored within the current step's . It supports QnA Maker's follow-up prompt and active learning features.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.Dialogs.QnAMakerDialog.Options
member.summary: The path for storing and retrieving the options for this instance of the dialog.
member.remarks: This includes the options with which the dialog was started and options expected by the QnA Maker service. It is stored within the current step's . It supports QnA Maker and the dialog system.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.Dialogs.QnAMakerDialog.DefaultThreshold
member.summary: The default threshold for answers returned, based on score.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.Dialogs.QnAMakerDialog.DefaultTopN
member.summary: The default maximum number of answers to be returned for the question.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The ID of the .
The ID of the QnA Maker knowledge base to query.
The QnA Maker endpoint key to use to query the knowledge base.
The QnA Maker host URL for the knowledge base, starting with "https://" and ending with "/qnamaker".
The activity to send the user when QnA Maker does not find an answer.
The threshold for answers returned, based on score.
The card title to use when showing active learning options to the user, if active learning is enabled.
The button text to use with active learning options, allowing a user to indicate none of the options are applicable.
The maximum number of answers to return from the knowledge base.
The activity to send the user if they select the no match option on an active learning card.
QnA Maker metadata with which to filter or boost queries to the knowledge base; or null to apply none.
An HTTP client to use for requests to the QnA Maker Service; or `null` to use a default client.
The source file path, for debugging. Defaults to the full path of the source file that contains the caller.
The line number, for debugging. Defaults to the line number in the source file at which the method is called.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.Dialogs.QnAMakerDialog.BeginDialogAsync(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.DialogContext,System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Called when the dialog is started and pushed onto the dialog stack.
member.param: The for the current turn of conversation.
Optional, initial information to pass to the dialog.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
If the task is successful, the result indicates whether the dialog is still active after the turn has been processed by the dialog.
You can use the parameter to include the QnA Maker context data, which represents context from the previous query. To do so, the value should include a `context` property of type .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.Dialogs.QnAMakerDialog.GetQnAMakerClientAsync(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.DialogContext)
member.summary: Gets an to use to access the QnA Maker knowledge base.
member.param: The for the current turn of conversation.
member.remarks: If the task is successful, the result contains the QnA Maker client to use.

member.param: The for the current turn of conversation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.IConfigurationBuilderExtensions.UseQnAMakerSettings(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Setup configuration to utilize the settings file generated by bf qnamaker:build.
member.remarks: This will pick up --environment as the environment to target. If environment is Development it will use the name of the logged in user. This will pick up --root as the root folder to run in.
member.param: Configuration builder to modify.
Root folder for bot assets.
Language region for QnA, e.g, en-us.
Running enviroment, e.g, development or alias.

member.summary: Executed when a result is returned from QnA Maker.
member.param: An array of .
The .
Additional properties to be logged to telemetry with the LuisResult event.
Additional metrics to be logged to telemetry with the LuisResult event.
A .
member.returns: A Task representing the work to be executed.

members.member:
Fills the event properties and metrics for the QnaMessage event for telemetry. These properties are logged when the QnA GetAnswers method is called.
QnA service results. Context object containing information for a single turn of conversation with a user. Properties to add/override for the event. Metrics to add/override for the event. A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation. additionalProperties A tuple of Properties and Metrics that will be sent to the IBotTelemetryClient.TrackEvent method for the QnAMessage event. The properties and metrics returned the standard properties logged with any properties passed from the GetAnswersAsync method.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.QnAMakerOptions.ScoreThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum score threshold, used to filter returned results.
member.remarks: Scores are normalized to the range of 0.0 to 1.0 before filtering.
member.value: The minimum score threshold, used to filter returned results.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.QnA.QnAMakerOptions.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the time in milliseconds to wait before the request times out.
member.value: The time in milliseconds to wait before the request times out. Default is 100000 milliseconds.
member.remarks: This property allows users to set Timeout without having to pass in a custom HttpClient to QnAMaker class constructor. If using custom HttpClient, then set Timeout value in HttpClient instead of QnAMakerOptions.Timeout.

member.value: The context of previous turn.
